description: These stuffed capsicums make a filling dinner, packed with nutty buckwheat and minced beef.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Ukrainian Stuffed Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 large red capsicums, sliced in half, cored

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Place the capsicum halves on a baking sheet and drizzle with a little oil.

Place the buckwheat in a saucepan with 300ml of water and soak for 20 minutes. Place the pan on the heat and bring to the boil, this should take about 3 minutes. Crumble in the stock cube and cook for 4 minutes more, remove from the heat and leave to stand with the lid on.

Heat the remaining oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions, carrots and chestnut mushrooms for 5 minutes, tip in the minced meat and cook for 5 more minutes until browned. Tip the buckwheat into the pan and stir to coat. Season well.
Fill each capsicum half with the beef and buckwheat mixture and bake for 25-30 minutes.
